serialize
Interface VSSerializable

All Known Implementing Classes:
VSAbstractEvent, VSAbstractInternalEvent, VSAbstractProcess, VSAbstractProtocol, VSBasicMulticastProtocol, VSBerkelyTimeProtocol, VSBroadcastProtocol, VSDefaultPrefs, VSDummyProtocol, VSExternalTimeSyncProtocol, VSInternalProcess, VSInternalTimeSyncProtocol, VSMessageReceiveEvent, VSOnePhaseCommitProtocol, VSPingPongProtocol, VSProcessCrashEvent, VSProcessRecoverEvent, VSProtocolEvent, VSProtocolScheduleEvent, VSReliableMulticastProtocol, VSSerializablePrefs, VSSimulator, VSSimulatorVisualization, VSTask, VSTaskManager, VSTwoPhaseCommitProtocol
public interface VSSerializable

The Interface VSSerializable, all classes which take part of the serialize/ deserialize proces are implementing this interface. It is preferred over the standard Serializable interface of Java because we want not serialize the whole class tree of each class but certain variables only!

Author:
Paul C. Buetow
